arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.INSTALL_FLG " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.OPTION_ID = 'B*'"
"SELECT " +" USER_MST.SECTION_CD, " +" USER_MST.APPR_POWER_TYP " +"FROM " +" USER_MST " +"WHERE " +" USER_MST.USER_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +"FROM " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.CODE " +"FROM " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"WHERE " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.SYS_CLASS = ? " +" AND SYS_CLASS_CODE.CLASS_CODE = 'PLANT_WEB'"

"SELECT " +" ROW_NUMBER() OVER( " +" ORDER BY " +" T.SHIP_ODR_NO, " +" T.SLIP_CD), " +" T.APPR_ID, " +" TO_CHAR(T.APPR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T.RESERVE_CAUSE, " +" T.SALES_SEQ_NO, " +" T.SHIP_ODR_NO, " +" T.SLIP_CD, " +" T.SALES_TYP, " +" T.CUST_CD, " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME, " +" T.SALES_DEPT_CD, " +" M_ORG.ORG_NAME, " +" T.ITEM_CD, " +" T.ITEM_NAME, " +" T.CUST_ODR_NO, " +" TO_CHAR(T.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD, " +" USERCUST.USER_NAME, " +" T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD, " +" USERODR.USER_NAME, " +" T.SALES_QTY, " +" T.SALES_UNIT_PRICE, " +" T.UNIT_CD, " +" T.SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES, " +" TO_CHAR(T.INSPC_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T.INSPC_ACPT_QTY, " +" T.EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT, " +" T.INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT, " +" T.TAX_AMOUNT_1, " +" T.TAX_AMOUNT_2, " +" T.TAX_AMOUNT_3, " +" T.OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT, " +" T.ORG_SLIP_CD, " +" T.CURRNCY_CD, " +" T.SPCL_PRICE_CO, " +" T.REMARKS, " +" T.INSPC_ACPT_TYP, " +" T.MODIFY_COUNT, " +" T.AI_AR_IF_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_SALES T, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST USERCUST, " +" USER_MST USERODR, " +" ( SELECT MAX(SALES_SEQ_NO) AS SALES_SEQ_NO " +" FROM T_SALES " +" GROUP BY SLIP_CD,SHIP_ODR_NO " +" ) A " +"WHERE " +" T.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE >= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE <= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DEPT_CD = ? " +" AND T.APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND T.STATUS = 20 " +" AND T.SALES_SEQ_NO = A.SALES_SEQ_NO " +" AND M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) = T.CUST_CD " +" AND M_ORG.ORG_CD(+) = T.SALES_DEPT_CD " +" AND USERCUST.USER_CD(+) = T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD " +" AND USERODR.USER_CD(+) = T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD " +"ORDER BY " +" T.SHIP_ODR_NO, " +" T.SLIP_CD"
"SELECT " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME " +"FROM " +" M_CUST " +"WHERE " +" M_CUST.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SHIP_ODR_NO = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SLIP_CD = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO < ? " +" AND T_SALES.APPR_FLG <> 3"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SHIP_ODR_NO = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SLIP_CD = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO > ? " +" AND T_SALES.APPR_FLG = 3"

"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG = ?, " +" T_SALES.APPR_ID = ?, " +" T_SALES.APPR_DATE = ?, " +" T_SALES.RESERVE_CAUSE = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SHIP_ODR_NO = ? " +"AND T_SALES.SLIP_CD = ?"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO = ? " +"FOR UPDATE NOWAIT"
"SELECT " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO " +"FROM " +" T_SALES " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SHIP_ODR_NO = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SLIP_CD = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO > ? " +" AND T_SALES.APPR_FLG = 1"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'JF*'"

"SELECT " +" ROW_NUMBER() OVER( " +" ORDER BY " +" T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO), " +" T.APPR_ID, " +" TO_CHAR(T.APPR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T.RESERVE_CAUSE, " +" T.SALES_SEQ_NO, " +" T_SHIP.ORGNAL_SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" T_SHIP.ORGNAL_SHIP_DLV_D_NO, " +" T.SALES_TYP, " +" T.CUST_CD, " +" M_CUST.CUST_NAME, " +" T.SALES_DEPT_CD, " +" M_ORG.ORG_NAME, " +" T.ITEM_CD, " +" T.ITEM_NAME, " +" T.CUST_ODR_NO, " +" TO_CHAR(T.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD, " +" USERCUST.USER_NAME, " +" T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD, " +" USERODR.USER_NAME, " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.SALES_QTY*(-1), T.SALES_QTY), " +" T.SALES_UNIT_PRICE, " +" T.UNIT_CD, " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.SALES_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES*(-1), T.SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES), " +" TO_CHAR(T.INSPC_ACPT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.INSPC_ACPT_QTY*(-1), T.INSPC_ACPT_QTY), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT*(-1), T.EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT*(-1), T.INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.TAX_AMOUNT_1*(-1), T.TAX_AMOUNT_1), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.TAX_AMOUNT_2*(-1), T.TAX_AMOUNT_2), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.TAX_AMOUNT_3*(-1), T.TAX_AMOUNT_3), " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT*(-1), T.OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT), " +" T.ORG_SLIP_CD, " +" T.CURRNCY_CD, " +" T.SPCL_PRICE_CO, " +" T.REMARKS, " +" T.INSPC_ACPT_TYP, " +" T.MODIFY_COUNT, " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.CUST_SALES_QTY*(-1), T.CUST_SALES_QTY), " +" T.CUST_UNIT_CD, " +" DECODE(T.STATUS, 10, T.CUST_INSPC_ACPT_QTY*(-1), T.CUST_INSPC_ACPT_QTY), " +" T.SALES_H_NO, " +" T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO, " +" T.AI_AR_IF_FLG, " +" T.TRANS_TYP, " +" B.APPR_HISTORY_FLG " +"FROM " +" T_SALES T, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST USERCUST, " +" USER_MST USERODR, " +" T_SHIP, " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" ( SELECT MAX(SALES_SEQ_NO) AS SALES_SEQ_NO " +" FROM T_SALES " +" WHERE APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND (STATUS = 20 AND ((APPR_FLG <> 1 AND INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) OR APPR_FLG = 1)) OR " +" (STATUS = 10 AND INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) " +" GROUP BY SHIP_DLV_H_NO,SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" ) A, " +" ( SELECT SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" SHIP_DLV_D_NO, " +" DECODE(SUM(INSPC_APPR_FLG), 0, '0', '1') AS APPR_HISTORY_FLG " +" FROM T_SALES " +" GROUP BY SHIP_DLV_H_NO,SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" ) B " +"WHERE " +" T.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE >= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE <= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DEPT_CD = ? " +" AND T.APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND ((T.STATUS = 20 AND ((T.APPR_FLG <> 1 AND T.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) OR T.APPR_FLG = 1)) OR (T.STATUS = 10 AND T.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1)) " +" AND T.SALES_SEQ_NO = A.SALES_SEQ_NO " +" AND T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO = B.SHIP_DLV_H_NO " +" AND T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO = B.SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" AND M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) = T.CUST_CD " +" AND M_ORG.ORG_CD(+) = T.SALES_DEPT_CD " +" AND USERCUST.USER_CD(+) = T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD " +" AND USERODR.USER_CD(+) = T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_DLV_H_NO(+) = T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_DLV_D_NO(+) = T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_CTRL_NO(+) = T.SHIP_CTRL_NO " +" AND T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ODR_H_NO(+) = T_SHIP.ODR_H_NO " +" AND T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ODR_D_SEQ_NO(+) = T_SHIP.ODR_D_SEQ_NO " +" AND (NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.DIRECT_FLG,0) = 0 OR " +" (NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.DIRECT_FLG,0) = 1 AND T_SHIP.ORGNAL_SHIP_DLV_H_NO IS NOT NULL)) " +"ORDER BY " +" T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO"
"SELECT " +" OPTION_ID " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.OPTION_ID = 'AiR' " +" AND SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.INSTALL_FLG = 1"
"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SHIP_DLV_H_NO = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SHIP_DLV_D_NO = ? " +" AND T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO <> ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG = 3, " +" T_SALES.APPR_ID = ?, " +" T_SALES.APPR_DATE = ?, " +" T_SALES.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1 " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO = ?"

"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG = 2, " +" T_SALES.APPR_ID = ?, " +" T_SALES.APPR_DATE = ?, " +" T_SALES.RESERVE_CAUSE = ?, " +" T_SALES.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1 " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO = ?"
"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" T_SALES.APPR_FLG = 1, " +" T_SALES.APPR_ID = ?, " +" T_SALES.APPR_DATE = ?, " +" T_SALES.RESERVE_CAUSE = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.SALES_SEQ_NO = ?"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_SALES T, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST USERCUST, " +" USER_MST USERODR, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(SALES_SEQ_NO) AS SALES_SEQ_NO " +" FROM " +" T_SALES " +" GROUP BY " +" SLIP_CD, " +" SHIP_ODR_NO " +" ) A " +"WHERE " +" T.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE >= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE <= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DEPT_CD = ? " +" AND T.APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND T.STATUS = 20 " +" AND T.SALES_SEQ_NO = A.SALES_SEQ_NO " +" AND M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) = T.CUST_CD " +" AND M_ORG.ORG_CD(+) = T.SALES_DEPT_CD " +" AND USERCUST.USER_CD(+) = T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD " +" AND USERODR.USER_CD(+) = T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"

"SELECT " +" COUNT(1) " +"FROM " +" T_SALES T, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST USERCUST, " +" USER_MST USERODR, " +" T_SHIP, " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR, " +" ( SELECT MAX(SALES_SEQ_NO) AS SALES_SEQ_NO " +" FROM T_SALES " +" WHERE APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND (STATUS = 20 AND ((APPR_FLG <> 1 AND INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) OR APPR_FLG = 1)) OR " +" (STATUS = 10 AND INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) " +" GROUP BY SHIP_DLV_H_NO,SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" ) A, " +" ( SELECT SHIP_DLV_H_NO, " +" SHIP_DLV_D_NO, " +" DECODE(SUM(INSPC_APPR_FLG), 0, '0', '1') AS APPR_HISTORY_FLG " +" FROM T_SALES " +" GROUP BY SHIP_DLV_H_NO,SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" ) B " +"WHERE " +" T.CUST_CD = ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE >= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DATE <= ? " +" AND T.SALES_DEPT_CD = ? " +" AND T.APPR_FLG = ? " +" AND ((T.STATUS = 20 AND ((T.APPR_FLG <> 1 AND T.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1) OR T.APPR_FLG = 1)) OR (T.STATUS = 10 AND T.INSPC_APPR_FLG = 1)) " +" AND T.SALES_SEQ_NO = A.SALES_SEQ_NO " +" AND T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO = B.SHIP_DLV_H_NO " +" AND T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO = B.SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" AND M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) = T.CUST_CD " +" AND M_ORG.ORG_CD(+) = T.SALES_DEPT_CD " +" AND USERCUST.USER_CD(+) = T.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD " +" AND USERODR.USER_CD(+) = T.ODR_ACPT_PSN_CD " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_DLV_H_NO(+) = T.SHIP_DLV_H_NO " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_DLV_D_NO(+) = T.SHIP_DLV_D_NO " +" AND T_SHIP.SHIP_CTRL_NO(+) = T.SHIP_CTRL_NO " +" AND T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ODR_H_NO(+) = T_SHIP.ODR_H_NO " +" AND T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.ODR_D_SEQ_NO(+) = T_SHIP.ODR_D_SEQ_NO " +" AND (NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.DIRECT_FLG,0) = 0 OR " +" (NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.DIRECT_FLG,0) = 1 AND T_SHIP.ORGNAL_SHIP_DLV_H_NO IS NOT NULL)) " +" AND ROWNUM <=TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
